title: hey riot how come lower levels are unable to jg becos we don't have enough masteries and runes?
body:
like i wanna learn how to jungle but im unable to do so
i was able to just make jungling work before the new patch but now it's like impossible for me to survive in the jg

replies.body: I have jungled shaco with no runes and not many masteries, but that was in the old jungle I dont know if it will work in the new one. Must be hell for you guys I feel sorry for ya. You CAN jungle warwick, xin, nunu, elise, but most of those are boring as %%%%.
People don't suggest jungle for new players (like myself)
This is why they made smite available at higher levels now.
pick warwick he works well without anything

At lower levels you're gonna need to to adapt what junglers you use. Warwick is good because he's got 2 forms of in built sustain for jungle routes. Elise can use her spiderlings to tank out the increased damage the camps put out. Nautilus is an okay pick, naturally tanky and reasonable clear times.

It's just a matter of learning and adapting. My tip to you, *make use of the smite bonuses from camps*. If you start at blue camp, take Gromp first, but lead with your smite so you get the poison armour. This helps take down Gromp quicker and assists in taking down your blue, plus your smite is up a little sooner seeing as you started the camp with it. I know it's harder with limited runes and masteries, but it can be done.

You gotta remember, the enemy jungler will most likely be having a similarly hard time. If you have to recall after 2-3 camps, do it. The enemy jungler is likely doing the same thing.

jungling isn't supposed to be easy. thats the point. You don't have a lane opponent to deal with other then sometimes people counter-jungling, so it was basically free gold and xp. making it harder is making you earn what laners have to fight for all the time.

Some champs can jungle without runes or masteries. Warwick, Xin Zhao, Nunu, Elise and Zac can all jungle pretty well without much help.

Because its better for lower level players to learn how to play the game first. Not just go into jungle role and play that for ages and not know how to play other lanes/ roles when they get higher lvl

we need champs too tho why should der be a disadvantage for us?

and sometimes we get matched with 30s and they have all which makes it easier for them to dominate us :/

Take barrier with your smite and time it to block 2+ large monster hits.

(protip use this for early dragons on multiple heroes)
